display_long_description:
Welcome to Xponential+

Enter into a global community of the best brands in boutique fitness with Xponential+. This premium fitness subscription app now features workouts from Rumble Boxing - the number one name in boxing fitness. Rumble Boxing combines the sweet science of boxing with the transformative power of strength training

Xponential+ also brings indoor cycling to virtual reality for the first time ever with CycleBar. Bring the worlds best studio cycling experience into VR and elevate your fitness journey with the most authentic virtual indoor cycling experience in the Metaverse.

Xponential+ also includes workouts from 3 other premier studio brands - Club Pilates, Pure Barre, and StretchLab, in one place for an ultimate virtual experience. With Xponential+, you can transport yourself into a photo-realistic studio experience anytime, anywhere. Choose from workouts including Cycling, Pilates, Barre and Stretching - there’s something for everyone.

Start a free trial to join the best community in group fitness, and the most desired fitness coaches.

Featuring:
The best boutique studio brands

Indoor studio cycling for the first time in VR!

Safely ride any stationary bike with surface synching and pass-through, which tracks your physical bike into the virtual studio

Feel like you're right in our studio with the most realistic virtual fitness program available

Bring our trainer into your space with mixed reality

Expert coaches, not influencers, guide your workout
